Firestore ãƒ«ãƒ¼ãƒ«:

service cloud.firestore {
  match /databases/{database}/documents {
    match /memos/{userId} {
      allow read, write: if request.auth.uid == userId;    
    }
  }
}

created:

created: function() {
  var self = this;
  firebase
    .firestore()
    .collection('memos')
    .doc(this.user.uid)
    .get()
    .then(function(doc) {
      if (doc.exists) {
        self.memos = doc.data().val;
      }
    });
},

saveMemos:

saveMemos: function() {
  firebase
    .firestore()
    .collection('memos')
    .doc(this.user.uid)
    .set({val: this.memos});
},
